snippet.title: Korean Chicken Recipe in Tamil | Korean Fried Chicken Recipe in Tamil | Crispy Fried Chicken
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make korean chicken recipe in tamil. This Korean fried chicken is super crispy and is perfectly seasoned with sauces. Marinating the chicken pieces in soy sauce adds more depth of flavor to the chicken and the coating of corn flour makes the chicken pieces very crispy. Once the chicken pieces are fried to perfection, they are tossed in the flavorful sauce and the sauce clings on to the chicken.

#KoreanChicken #koreanfriedchicken 

Friends, please do try this korean fried chicken recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
3 tbsp Oil
7-8 Garlic cloves
5 dry red chillies
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1 tsp Garlic paste
2 tbsp Honey
1.5 tbsp Soy sauce
2 tbsp Vinegar
1/4 tsp pepper
required Salt

For marinating Chicken:
300g boneless Chicken
1 tsp Soy sauce
1 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
1/2 tsp pepper
required Salt
6 tbsp Corn flour

Extras:
toasted Peanuts
toasted sesame seeds
spring Onion
tags: korean fried chicken recipe in tamil

snippet.title: Poorita Recipe | Poori Taco Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we are going to see how to make poori taco recipe in tamil. This is an adapted taco recipe in which we are going to make slightly thicker pooris and then stuff them with chickpeas, onion, tomotoes and seasonings. We can make this taco with sauces or we can make a sauce free version. Tacos are famous mexican street food and these Indian style tacos do taste amazing. These tacos can be filled with any stuffing of your choice.
#TacoRecipe #TacoRecipeinTamil #tacosrecipe 

Friends, please do try these tacos at home and share them with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: makes 4
For poori Taco:
1 cup Wheat flour
2 tbsp Curd
1/4 tsp baking soda
1/4 tsp saltt
1 tbsp Oil
required Water

For stuffing: method 1 
1 cup cooked Chickpea
1/4 cup Onion
1/4 cup Tomato
2 tbsp Coriander leaves
1 tbsp chilli sauce
1 tbsp tomato sauce
pinch of Salt
pepper

For stuffing: method 2
1 cup cooked Chickpea
1/4 cup Onion
1/4 cup Tomato
2 tbsp Coriander leaves
1/4  cup carrot
1/4 tsp Chilli sauce
juice of 1 Lemon
pinch of Salt
pepper

1/2 cup thick curd
omapodi or sev
tags: how to make tacos in tamil

snippet.title: Mini Jangiri Recipe in Tamil | Jangiri Sweet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make mini jangiri recipe in tamil. Mini Jangiri is a fun recipe which is crispy on the outside with a soft center soaked in sugar syrup. Mini Jangiris are famous festival time sweets made during diwali and other festivals. We have to make sure to fry these jangiris at medium heat so that they get cooked fully without browning.
#Jangiri #MiniJangiri #sweetrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this jangiri recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 cup Urad dal
2 tbsp Raw rice
1/4 cup Corn flour
pinch of Salt
yellow food color

For sugar syrup: 
2.5 cup Sugar
1.5 cup Water
5-6 drops lemon
1/8 tsp Cardamom powder
pinch of Salt
tags: mini jangiri sweet recipe in tamil

snippet.title: Banana Rolls in Tamil | Banana Rice Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make banana rolls recipe in tamil. This banana rice cake is made by rolling a banana with coconut stuffing and wrapping it in a rice flour layer. Then they are steamed inside a banana leaf and this locks in the flavor and the cooking happens inside the rolled banana leaf.
#BananaRolls #BananaCake #bananasweetrecipe 

Friends, please do try this banana sweet recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: Makes 8 
1 cup Idiyappam flour
pinch of salt
1 cup boiling water

For stuffing:
1/2 cup Coconut
1/2 cup jaggery
1/4 cup tutti frutti
5 broken Cashews
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
1 Large Banana
Banana leaves
tags: banana rice cake recipe in tamil

snippet.title: Kizhi Parotta Recipe in Tamil | Banana Leaf Parotta | Street food Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make kizhi parotta recipe in tamil. In this recipe, parottas are soaked in salna and layered with a spicy chicken masala and wrapped in a banana leaf. Then they are cooked in high heat, the parottas and the masala gets steamed inside the banana leaf and the parottas are completely soaked with the flavor from the masala. Kizhi parottas are a new street food style and they can be made with a wide variety of fillings.
#kizhiparotta #kizhiporotta #streetfoodtamil 

Friends, please do try this kizhi parotta recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For grinding:
1/2 cup Coconut 
1 Cinnamon
3 cloves
3 cardamom
1 tsp Fennel seeds
1 tsp Cumin seeds
1 tsp pepper
1 tsp poppy seeds
1 tsp roasted channa dal(pottu kadalai)
2 tbsp Water
For Chicken Salna:
2 tbsp oil
1 Bay leaf
1 Cinnamon
2 cloves
2 cardamom
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds
2 Onion
1 tbsp Ginger Garlic paste
3 Green chillies
10-12 Mint leaves
1/2 tsp Turmeric powder
1 tbsp Coriander powder
2 tsp Chilli powder
2 Tomatoes
1/2 kg Chicken
required Salt
required Water
handful Coriander leaves

For chicken roast:
2 tbsp oil
1/2 Onion
few curry leaves
1 cup Chicken
1/2 tsp garam masala
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
required Salt

2 Banana Leaf 
4 Parotta
some chopped Onion
some chopped coriander leaves
1 tsp oil
1/4+1/4 cup Water

snippet.title: Mexican Bun Recipe in Tamil | Mexican Sweet Bread Recipe in Tamil | Conchas Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make mexican bun recipe in tamil. This version of sweet bun is a famous mexican street food and it it made by coating the bun dough with a sugary mix and baking them in the oven. We can make interesting shapes and colors with this recipe.
#MexicanRecipesTamil #BunRecipesTamil #bakingrecipes 

Friends, please do try this mexican bun recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

For eggless version please follow this dough and divide into 8 portions
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B_mRG8UTmgU

In Pressure cooker it takes approximately 20 min on medium heat. 

Ingredients: makes 8 concha's
1/2 cup Luke warm milk(125 ml)
1 tsp Sugar
1.5 tsp yeast
2.25 cup Maida (285 g approx.)
6 tbsp Sugar (75 g)
1/4 tsp Salt
1 Egg
4 tbsp Butter (50 g)

1/2 cup Maida (6r g approx.)
1/4 cup Sugar (50 g)
1/4 cup Butter (50 g)
Colors (optional)
Bake at 350 F / 175 C for 16-18 min

snippet.title: Kachori Recipe in Tamil | Evening Tea time Chaat Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make kachori recipe in tamil. This is a great evening snacks recipe which pairs well with tea / coffee. Kachoris are filled with spicy masala filling and the outer layer is very crispy and crunchy. They have a very unique taste and texture.
#KachoriRecipe #kachorichaat #snacksrecipe 

Friends, please do try this kachori recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: Makes 11-12 kachori
1.5 cup Maida
2 tbsp Oil
required salt
required Water

For masala:
1 tsp Coriander seeds
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1 tsp Ginger
1 green chilli
1 tsp oil
2 tbsp besan flour

For masala Stuffing:
1 tbsp Oil
2 onion
1/8 tsp Asafoetida
1/8 tsp turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
3 medium potatoes
Coriander leaves
1/2 lemon 
required Salt
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Ghee Mysore Pak Recipe in Tamil | Soft Melt in mouth Milk Mysore Pak in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make ghee mysore pak recipe in tamil. This is a soft melt in mouth milk mysore pak which is very soft and smooth. I have used a mixture of oil and ghee in this recipe but it can be switched with pure ghee. Mysore pak is a great recipe to make during the festivals and holidays. 
#MysorePak #mysorepakrecipe #mysorepakrecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this mysore pak recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for making Soft Mysore pak recipe: 
1/4 cup Besan flour(25 g)
3/4 cup Milk powder (75 g)
1/2 cup oil(100 g)
1 cup Ghee (200 g)
1.5 cup Sugar (300 g)

snippet.title: Paasiparuppu  Bubble Paniyaram in Tamil | Kid's Evening Snacks Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make bubble paniyaram recipe in tamil. This paniyaram can be made easily with household ingredients and pasiparuppu is also filled with nutrients. This paniyaram is crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. Also, we need to keep the temperature of the oil at a moderate heat. If the oil temperature is too high, the paniyaram will get burnt and if the temperature is too low, they will soak up a lot of oil.
#Paniyaram #PaniyaramRecipe #kidssnacksrecipe 

Friends, please do try this paniyaram recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

snippet.title: Meal Maker Kulambu Recipe in Tamil | Soya Chunks Kulambu | Meal maker Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make meal maker kulambu recipe in tamil. This meal maker curry is the perfect combination for variety rice and also goes well with other rice recipes. This curry can also be served along with tiffin items. Adding potatoes to the meal maker kulambu adds a contrasting textures between the potatoes and soya chunks. 
#MealmakerKulambu #MealmakerRecipe #SoyaChunksRecipes 

Friends, please do try this meal maker kulambu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Serve this kulambu along with some hot rice. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for nagercoil style meal maker curry:
For masala:
1/2 cup Coconut
1 Cinnamon
2 Cardamom
2 Cloves
1 tsp Fennel seeds
1 tsp Cumin seeds
1 inch Ginger
3 Garlic cloves
1/8 tsp turmeric powder
1 tbsp Coriander powder
1 tbsp Chili powder
1 tsp Oil
1 Onion
1 Tomato

For meal maker curry:
2-3 tbsp Oil
1 cup meal maker (soya chunks)
2 Medium potatoes cut into large cubes
2 cup Water
required Salt
Curry leaves

snippet.title: Chirote Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Chirote recipe in tamil. This is a popular diwali sweet with is often served with badam milk. Chirote is a flaky sweet recipe with an interesting taste and texture. It's flaky layers are very crispy. Soaking it in kheer or badam milk will cause it to absorb the flavors into it.
#Chirote #ChiroteRecipe

Friends, please do try this chirote recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during the festival season. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: Makes 12 Chirote 
1 cup Maida (125 g)
pinch of Salt
1 tbsp Ghee
required Water

For layering: 
2 tbsp Ghee
4 tbsp Corn flour
pinch of pink food color (optional)

For sugar syrup: 
1 cup Sugar
3/4 cup Water
1/4 tsp Lemon juice
1/8 tsp Cardamom powder
Oil for frying

localized.title: Chirote Recipe in Tamil
localized.description:
In this video we will see how to make Chirote recipe in tamil. This is a popular diwali sweet with is often served with badam milk. Chirote is a flaky sweet recipe with an interesting taste and texture. It's flaky layers are very crispy. Soaking it in kheer or badam milk will cause it to absorb the flavors into it.
#Chirote #ChiroteRecipe

Friends, please do try this chirote recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during the festival season. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: Makes 12 Chirote 
1 cup Maida (125 g)
pinch of Salt
1 tbsp Ghee
required Water

For layering: 
2 tbsp Ghee
4 tbsp Corn flour
pinch of pink food color (optional)

For sugar syrup: 
1 cup Sugar
3/4 cup Water
1/4 tsp Lemon juice
1/8 tsp Cardamom powder
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Sutta Kathirikai Kulambu Recipe in Tamil | Smoked Brinjal Recipe in Tamil | Kathirikkai Thokku
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Sutta Kathirikkai kulambu recipe in tamil. This smoked brinjal curry has a wonderful taste and texture to it. Smoking the brinjal over fire unlocks a lot of smoky flavor from the brinjal and this is contrasted by the sourness from tamarind and tomatoes. This smooth gravy can be served as a side dish for rice, chapathi and tiffin items.
#SmokedBrinjal #SuttaKathirikkai

Friends, please do try this sutta kathirikkai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
4 large Brinjal
2 Tomatoes
5-6 Garlic cloves
2 tbsp Oil
1/8 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
2 dry red Chilllies
1/2 Onion
Curry leaves
1/8 tsp Asafoetida
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
3/4 tsp Cumin powder
1.5 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chilli powder
small Tamarind(optional)
required Salt
required Water
Coriander leaves

snippet.title: Custard Cake Recipe in Tamil | No Cream Eggless Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make custard cake recipe in tamil. This cake can be made without cream and it is an eggless cake version. Instead of using butter cream, we can use custard cream. Even butter is optional in this recipe and can be substituted with ghee.
#CustardCake #EgglessCake #NoCreamCake

Friends, please do try this custard cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For Custard Cream:
2 cup Milk
1/2 cup Sugar
1/4 tbsp Custard powder
pinch of Salt
2 tbsp Butter or Ghee

For Eggless Sponge Cake:
1/2 cup Curd
1/2 cup Oil
3/4 cup Milk
1 cup Sugar
1 tsp Vanilla extract
2 cup Maida
2 tsp Baking powder
1/4 tsp baking Soda
pinch of Salt
7 inch pan: 350 F / 175c For 40-42 min

For simple Sugar syrup:
3 tbsp Sugar
3 tbsp Water
tags: how to make cake without butter
how to make cake without cream

snippet.title: Potato Capsicum Curry Recipe in Tamil | Side dish for Chapati in Tamil | Capsicum Gravy in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make potato capsicum curry in tamil. This capsicum gravy is a perfect side dish for chapati and rice. Both Potato and capsicum compliment each other and the flavors from the masala are well absorbed by potatoes. The masala is well cooked and thickened well and coats the potatoes and capsicum pieces very well.
#CapsicumCurry #CapsicumGravy #ChapatiSideDish

Friends, please do try this capsicum curry at home and serve it with some hot chapati. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 tbsp peanut
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
4 tbsp Oil
1 Capsicum
1 Onion
2 Potatoes
2 Onion
1 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
1/4 tsp Garam masala
1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chili powder
1 Tomato
1.5 cup Water
required Salt
Coriander leaves

snippet.title: Paneer Biryani Recipe in Tamil | Paneer Biryani in Pressure Cooker in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make paneer biryani recipe in tamil. In this version of paneer biryani, we are going make this recipe in a pressure cooker. The paneer pieces when cooked, soak up all the flavors from the masala and seasonings. The rice is also very flavorful and this biryani is very easy to make in a short amount of time. 
#PaneerBiryani #BiryaniInPressureCooker #BiryaniRecipe

3 Cloves

snippet.title: Arisi Halwa Recipe in Tamil | Rice Halwa Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make rice halwa recipe in tamil. This Arisi halwa is made from raw rice (pachharisi) and jaggery. It has a wonderful taste and texture but can be made easily with household ingredients. Compared to other halwas, this recipe uses much less ghee but is still very tasty.
#RiceHalwa #ArisiHalwa

Friends, please do try this rice halwa recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Raw Rice(100 g)
1/3 cup Water (6 tbsp)
1 cup Jaggery (150 g)
1/2 cup Water
1 cup grated coconut
1+1/2 cup Water
1 tbsp Ghee
10 broken Cashews
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
pinch of Salt

snippet.title: Iced Tea Recipe in Tamil | Mint Tea, Orange Tea, Pineapple Tea Recipe in Tamil | Summer Cool Drink
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make iced tea recipe in tamil. Ice tea is a great cooling recipe for the summer months and we can easily make these three varieties of iced tea. Mint, Orange and Pineapple iced tea are great flavors and will provide good refreshment from summer heat. 
#IcedTea #IceTea #SummerRecipe

Friends, please do try these iced tea recipes at home and share it with your friends and family and beat the summer heat. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

For Tea:
3 cup Water
1.5 tsp Tea powder

For Mint Iced tea:
30 Mint leaves
1 small piece Ginger
1/2 cup Water
3-4 tbsp honey or Sugar as required
Ice cubes
2 lemon slices
3 mint leaves

For Orange Iced Tea:
2-3 Oranges
4 tbsp Sugar or as required
Ice cubes
2 Orange slices
3 mint leaves

For Pineapple Iced Tea:
1 cup Pineapple
1 cup Water
3-4 tbsp honey or Sugar as required
Ice cubes
4 pineapple pieces
3 mint leaves

snippet.title: Mughlai Mutton Curry in Tamil | Mutton Kulambu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make mughlai mutton curry recipe in tamil. This restaurant style mutton curry can be made at home in a pressure cooker. The mutton pieces are well cooked and are very tender. This mutton curry is a great combination for rice / chapathi. The pieces are well seasoned from the added spices.
#MuttonCurry #MuttonKulambu #MuttonGravy

Friends, please do try this mutton kulambu at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients for restaurant style Mutton Gravy: 
6 tbsp Oil
3 medium sized onion or 2 large (approx. 300 g)
10 Cashews
1/4 cup Water
1/2 cup Curd (not sour)
1 bay leaf
1 Cinnamon
2 Cloves
2 Cardamom
1/2 Kg Mutton
2 Green Chilies
1 tbsp Ginger Garlic paste
1/4 tsp turmeric powder
1 tsp Garam masala
1 tsp Cumin powder
1 tbsp Coriander powder
1 tbsp Chili powder 
1.5 cup Water
required Salt
handful Coriander leaves

snippet.title: Idli Chaat Recipe in Tamil | Leftover Idli Recipe | Blooming Idli Snack Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make idli chaat recipe in tamil. We can make this easy recipe from left over idlis and this is a great evening snack. Fried idlis have a unique taste and texture and making this crisscross pattern on the idlis makes a blooming shape and gets fried very well. I have demonstrated one method of using fried idli in evening snack recipes but the possibilities are endless. 
#FriedIdli #IdliChaat #EveningSnacks

1 Potato
2 cup Water

1 Onion
2 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
Curry leaves

1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chili powder

required Salt

chopped Onion

Lemon juice
Sev

snippet.title: Glass Halwa Recipe in Tamil | Pasi Payaru Jelly Recipe without Gelatin or Agar agar in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Pasi payaru jelly recipe in tamil. This jelly recipe can be made without gelatin or agar agar. We are only going to use moong dal or pasi payaru to make this jelly. It is a little long process but the texture and color of this recipe looks like a glass halwa. If we remove it from heat early it will resemble a glass halwa but if it is cooked longer it will become like a jelly recipe which is chewy.
#JellyRecipe #GummyRecipe #JellyWithoutGelatin

Friends, please do try this jelly recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 cup Green Gram(200 g)
1+3+1 cup Water
2 cup Water
1 cup sugar(or a 2 tbsp less than 1 cup)
pinch of Salt
1/4 cup Ghee(4 tbsp)
1/2 tsp Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Fried Egg Puff Recipe in Tamil| How to make Egg Puff without Oven | No Butter | Egg Samosa in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make easy egg puff recipe in tamil. This egg puff can be made without oven and is made without butter or puff sheets. Like a samosa we can fold thin sheets around the egg to create a crispy flaky surface. Since we can fry them in oil, we don't need an oven or pressure cooker
#EggPuff #EggSamosa #FriedEggPuffs

Friends, please do try this Fried Egg puff recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: makes 12 Puffs
For the sheet:
1 cup Maida
1/4 tsp Salt
1 tbsp Ghee or Butter
required Water

For Filling:
1 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds
2 Onion
1 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2-1 tsp Chili powder
2 Tomatoes
required Salt
3 boiled Eggs (cut into 12 pieces)
Oil for frying
tags: egg puff without oven and butter

snippet.title: Mango Jelly Cake | Mango Cheesecake Recipe in Tamil | Homemade Cream Cheese from Milk
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cheesecake recipe in tamil. For making this cheese cake we are going to make cream cheese from raw milk (from scratch). This cake has a very soft and smooth texture which is contrasted by the mango jelly on top.  This is a no bake cheesecake and can be made without oven or pressure cooker. 
#Cheesecake #HomemadeCreamChesse #NoBakeCake

Friends, please do try this homemade cheesecake at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Step 1: 
For Homemade cream Cheese :
1 Liter full fat Milk (4 cup)
4 tbsp Lemon juice
pinch of Salt
2 tbsp Milk

Step 2: 
For Biscuit Layer:
12 Marie gold Biscuit
2 tbsp melted Ghee

Step 3: 
For Cheese cake layer:
150 g cream cheese from (step 1) or readymade cream cheese
1/2 cup Condensed milk (150 g)
3-4 tbsp Mango Pulp
1 tsp Gelatin or Agar Agar (china grass)
6 tbsp Water

For mango Jelly:
1/2 tsp Agar agar powder
4 tbsp Water
2 tbsp Sugar
3/4 cup Mango Pulp
tags: how to make cream cheese at home

snippet.title: Stuffed Semiya Jamun in Tamil | Semiya Sweet Recipe in Tamil | Vermicelli Kunafa Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make vermicelli kunafa recipe in tamil. Kunafa is a popular Arabic recipe made with fine noodles, cream cheese and custard and this is a Eid special sweet recipe made during Ramadan festival. In this recipe we have made modifications to make this recipe without oven and without cream cheese. We can make custard using custard powder or using corn flour and we can make this in a kuzhipaniyaram pan as well. This semiya sweet has a wonderful crispy exterior with a sweet and soft interior.
#Kunafa #VermicelliKunafa #SemiyaJamun

Friends, please do try this vermicelli kunafa recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: 
2 tbsp Corn flour or Custard powder
4 tbsp Sugar
1 cup Milk
2 tsp Ghee
1/8 tsp Cardamom powder
100 g roasted Vermicelli (1 cup)
2 tbsp Sugar
2 tbsp Ghee

snippet.title: Fruit Ice Recipe in Tamil | பழ ஐஸ் | 2 Ingredient Ice Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make fruit ice recipe in tamil. This simple ice sorbet can be made with just two ingredients, fruits and sugar. This ice has all the freshness of fruit and is great to cool during the summertime. 
#FruitIce #Sorbet #SummerRecipes

Friends, please do try this fruit ice recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during summer. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

For Sugar Syrup:
1 cup Sugar
1 cup Water

For Mango Sorbet / Mango Ice:
4 Mangoes
1/4 cup Sugar syrup or to taste

For Cantaloupe Sorbet / Cantaloupe Ice:
1/2 Cantaloupe
1/2 Lemon
1/4 cup Sugar syrup or to taste

For Pineapple Sorbet / Pineapple Ice:
1 Pineapple 
1/2 Lemon
1/4 cup Sugar syrup or to taste

For Watermelon Sorbet / Watermelon Ice:
1 Watermelon 
1/2 Lemon
1/4 cup Sugar syrup or to taste

snippet.title: Poricha Parotta Recipe in Tamil | Fried Parotta Recipe in Tamil | Ennai Parotta
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make poricha parotta recipe in tamil. This ennai parotta/ fried parotta has a very interesting texture. It has a crispy exterior surface while still retaining some soft and stretchy texture on the inside. We need to slightly cook the parottas before frying them and this makes them soak up less oil.
#PorichaParotta #EnnaiParotta #FriedParotta

Friends, please do try this poricha parotta at home and share this amazing recipe with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 8 Poricha Parotta
3 cup Maida
1 tsp Sugar
1.5 tsp Salt
1/4 cup Milk (cows milk)
required Water
1+1+1+1  tbsp Oil
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Summer Drink Recipe in Tamil (with Mokka Bloopers) |  Rose Milk and Caramel Milk Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cool summer drink recipe in Tamil. These two recipes Rose Milk and Caramel Milk are great to cool off in the summer. They are very easy to make and are fun recipes. Alandra had a lot of fun making these recipes and hope you will enjoy those bloopers as well.
#RoseMilk #CaramelMilk #SummerRecipes

Friends, please do try these summer recipes at home and stay cool during summer. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Falooda Sev recipe:
1/2 cup Corn flour
3 tbsp Sugar
1.5 cup Water
Ice cold Water

4-5 Almond Gum
1 cup Water

For Rose milk:
1 cup Sugar
3/4 cup Water
Pink Food Color
1/2 tsp Rose Essence

For Caramel Syrup:
1 cup Sugar
3/4 cup Hot water

Boiled and chillied Milk

snippet.title: Egg Pulao Recipe in Tamil | Quick and Simple Lunchbox Pulao Recipe in Tamil | Muttai Pulav
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make egg pulao recipe in tamil. This is a quick and easy version which is perfect for lunchbox recipe and for everyday meals. It's slightly milder and has less oil than the traditional version but that makes it perfect for an everyday pulao. This pulav rice is very flavorful and the seasoned eggs are a perfect combination to an awesome lunch.
#EggPulao #MuttaiPulav #lunchboxRecipe

Friends, please do try this lunchbox pulao recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 tbsp Oil
2 tbsp Ghee
2 bay leaves,1 Cinnamon,2 Cloves,2 Cardamom
1/2 tsp pepper corns
1 Onion
1 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
2 Green Chilies
handful Coriander leaves
handful Mint leaves
1/8 tsp turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1 tsp Chili powder
1/4 cup Curd
2.5 cup Water
1.5 cup Basmati Rice(300g)
required Salt

For Egg Masala:
2 tbsp Oil
1/8 tsp turmeric powder
1/4 tsp Garam masala powder
1/4 tsp Chili powder
1/4 tsp pepper powder
little Salt

snippet.title: Vazhakkai Kulambu Recipe in Tamil | Banana Kuzhambu | Kulambu Varieties in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make vazhakkai kulambu recipe in tamil. This vazhakkai recipe is very easy to make and this kulambu can be served over hot rice. Raw banana has a good taste and texture and in this kara kuzhambu the banana pieces are well soaked  and absorb the flavor of the kulambu. 
#VazhakkaiKulambu #VazhakkaiRecipes

Friends, please do try this vazhakkai kulambu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. And also please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 Raw Banana
1/4 tsp Turmeric 
1 tsp Chili powder
salt as required
2 tbsp Oil

For Kulambu base:
1 tsp oil
1 Onion
1/4 inch Ginger
4 Garlic pods
2 Tomatoes

For Grinding:
3 tbsp Coconut
4 Cashews
1/2 tsp Fennel seeds

For Gravy:
3 tbsp Oil
1/4 tsp Mustard seeds
4 small Onion
Curry leaves
1 tsp Cumin powder
2 tsp Coriander powder
2 tsp Chili powder
1 small Tamarind
required Water
required Salt

snippet.title: Eggless Rava Cake Recipe in Tamil | Simple Lemon Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make a simple rava cake recipe in tamil. This cake is lemon flavored and we are going to use a sugar syrup to add moisture and flavor to the cake, This cake can be made without oven in a pressure cooker as well.
#RavaCake #SoojiCake #SemolinaCake

Friends, please do try this rava cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Curd
1/2 cup Oil
1/2 cup Sugar
1/2 cup Milk
1 cup fine Rava
1/2 tsp baking Soda
pinch of Salt

For sugar syrup:
1/4 cup Sugar
6 tbsp Water
1/2 tsp Lemon juice

Bake @ 350 F/175C for 23-25 min (8 inch square pan)
Cooker 28-30 min at medium heat (6 inch round pan)

snippet.title: Thakkali Oorugai in Tamil | Tomato Pickle Recipe in Tamil | தக்காளி ஊறுகாய்
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make tomato pickle recipe in tamil. This thakkali oorugai is a great combination for rice, dosa, idli and chapathi. It brings out the tangy tomato with spicy flavors and can be directly mixed with rice to make an instant variety rice. It can also be used as a side dish for idli, dosa and chapathi. 
#ThakkaliOorugai #TomatoPickle

Friends, please do try this tomato pickle recipe at home and serve it with some hot rice or as a side dish to dosa or chapathi. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 kg Tomatoes
lemon sized Tamarind (4-5 strand)
To grind:
1 tsp Fenugreek
1 tsp Mustard seeds
For Tempering:
5-6 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
10 Fenugreek
15-20 garlic pods
3 dry Red Chilies
3 spring Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Asafoetida
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
2 tbsp Chili powder
1.25 tsp Salt or as preferred
1 tbsp extra Oil
small piece of Jaggery (optional)

snippet.title: Buttons Recipe in Tamil | Button Murukku Recipe in Tamil | Crispy Button Murukku
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make button murukku recipe in tamil. These small circular murukkus are very fun to make and easy. These have such a crunchy texture and are a great evening snack combination for tea /coffee. These button murukkus are a combination of thattai and murukku. They a little time consuming to make but their appearance and taste is worth the effort.
#ButtonsRecipe #ButtonMurukku

Friends, please do try this button murukku recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2-3 green Chilies
4 garlic cloves
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1 cup Water
3/4 tsp Salt
1 tsp Oil
1 cup Rice flour
1/8 tsp Asafoetida
2 tsp Sesame seeds
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Potato Kurma Recipe in Tamil | | பன்னீர் பட்டர் மசாலா சுவையில் உருளை குருமா | Gravy for Chapathi
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make potato kurma recipe in tamil. This Potato gravy tastes very similar to paneer butter masala but can be made with simple ingredients. This potato kurma is a great combination for chapati, naan, dosa and idli and it also goes well with rice / fried rice. This potato kurma and chapathi is a great dinner recipe which is very easy to put together.
#PotatoKurma #PotatoGravy

Friends, please do try this potato kurma recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
3 large Potatoes
1/8 tsp turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Chili powder
required Salt
2 tbsp Oil
1 Onion
1/2 inch Ginger

snippet.title: How to make Maida at Home in Tamil | மைதா மாவு  செய்வது எப்படி |  Homemade Pure Maida Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make maida at home. Maida (All purpose flour) is made from wheat and is processed to have a bright white color. Maida is the soluble portion (starch) from wheat and it can be made easily at home from either wheat flour, whole wheat or from Rava (Sooji). Since we are not adding any additives or chemicals this will be a healthy option to make homemade maida and this flour can be used to make pastries, cakes and other sweet/ snack recipes.
#Maida #HomemadeMaida #MaidaRecipe

Friends, please do try this maida recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
500g Rava
9-10 cup Water

snippet.title: Afterschool Kids Snack Recipes in Tamil | Healthy Evening Snacks Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make afterschool snacks recipes in tamil. These healthy evening snacks are both fulfilling and high in protein. These recipes are very easy to make and can be put together in a couple of minutes. I am making four different evening snacks, Sundal, Masala sweet corn, Sweet Payaru and masala kadalai.
#AfterSchoolSnacks #EveningSnacks

Friends, please do try these afterschool evening snacks at home and rejuvenate in the evening. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For Roadside kadalai:
1 cup Peanuts
handful grated  carrot
1/2 Onion
1/2 Tomato
1 green chili(optional)
handful grated Raw mango (optional)
required Salt
1/4 -1/2 tsp Chili powder
Coriander leaves
juice of 1/2 Lemon

For sweet payaru:
1/2 cup Green gram
1/8 tsp Salt
1/4 cup grated coconut
2-3 tbsp Sugar
cardamom powder (optional)

For Sundal:
1 cup black chickpea
required Salt
1 inch Ginger
2 Green Chilies
3/4 tsp Fennel seeds
1 tbsp Oil
1/2 tsp Mustard seeds
2 dry red Chilies
2 spring Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Turmeric
1/8 tsp asafoetida
1 Onion
1/4 cup Grated Coconut
1/2 Lemon 

For Masala sweet Corn:
2 cup sweet corn
2-3 tbsp Butter
1/4 tsp Chili powder
1/4 tsp pepper powder
1/4 tsp Chat masala
required Salt
10-15 drops of lemon juice

snippet.title: Swirl Bun Recipe in Tamil | Cinnamon Rolls Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cinnamon rolls recipe in tamil. Cinnamon and sugar pair very well and the spice from cinnamon cuts through the sweetness of sugar and these cinnamon swirl buns incorporate this combination. These homemade cinnamon rolls are absolutely wonderful and they smell and taste amazing fresh out of the oven.
#CinnamonRoll #CinnamonSwirl 

Friends, please do try these cinnamon rolls recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1/2 cup Milk
1 tsp Sugar
1 tsp Yeast
2 cup Maida
3 tbsp Sugar
1/8 tsp Salt
1/4 cup melted Butter

3 inch Cinnamon
2+2 tbsp Brown Sugar
2 tbsp room temperature Butter

For Glaze:
4 tbsp Powdered Sugar
1 tbsp Milk
1 tsp melted Butter

Bake at 350 F / 175 C for 25-27 min
Pan : medium heat for 27 min

snippet.title: Sakkarai Pongal Recipe | Sweet Pongal Recipe in Tamil | Making Pongal In Pot | சர்க்கரை பொங்கல்
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Sakkarai pongal at home. This version of pongal can be made in a pot instead of cooking in a pressure cooker. Slowly simmering rice creates a wonderful taste and texture to this pongal recipe. This sweet pongal can be garnished with roasted cashews, raisins or with chipped coconut pieces. 
#Pongal #SweetPongal #PongalRecipe

Wish you all a very Happy Pongal 2022. Friends, please do try this pongal recipe during the upcoming holidays and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
1 cup Raw Rice
1/2 cup Paasi Paruppu / Moong Dal
1 cup Milk
1 cup rinsed rice Water
4.5 cup - 5 cup Water
2 cup Jaggery
2 tbsp Ghee
1 tsp Cardamom powder
3-4 tbsp Ghee
1/4 cup coconut pieces
15-20 Cashews
1/4 cup Raisins

snippet.title: Eggless Butterscotch Cake Recipe in Tamil | Homemade Butterscotch Cake in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make butterscotch cake at home in tamil. This butterscotch cake recipe is very easy to make and we can make this delicious cake with simple ingredients at home. The main flavor of the cake comes from the butterscotch syrup which is made from butter, sugar and cream. The caramelized cashews adds a nice crunch and texture to the cake. 
#ButterscotchCake #Butterscotch #CakeRecipesInTamil

Friends, please do try this butterscotch cake recipe at home and make this for any celebration at home. The cake has a very rich taste and is delicious. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For Eggless Sponge Cake:
1/2 cup Curd
3/4 cup Milk
1/2 cup Oil
1 cup Sugar
1 tsp Vanilla extract
2 cup Maida
2 tsp Baking powder
1/2 tsp Baking Soda
2 pinch Salt
Bake at 350F/175 C for 45-47 min for 7 inch Pan

For Butterscotch Syrup:
1/2 cup Sugar
1/4 cup Butter
1/2 cup Cream
2 pinch Salt

For Caramelized Cashews:
1/2 cup Cashews
1/4 cup Sugar
1 tbsp Butter

For light Sugar Syrup:
3 tbsp Water
3 tbsp Sugar

For Cream:
1/4 cup Sugar
2 cup whipping Cream
2-3 tbsp Butterscotch Syrup from step 2
yellow food Color (optional)
